job.title: Principal Software Engineer

ContributorTravelltligtltligtNoScheduleltligtltligtFulltimeShiftltligtltligtDay JobRequisition Numberltligtltligt202103557Cox Automotive is looking for an experienced Principal Software Engineer to upgrade and maintain web and mobile applications Principal Software Engineers responsibilities include recommending software solutions designing software solutions building reliable and scalable software features and products Principal engineers should be able to mentor midlevel and senior engineersTo be successful as Principal Software Engineer you should be able to work with Product Managers to evaluate feature requirements system limitations and time constraints Principal Software Engineers should be up to date on new technologies and software development practices Due to current COVID19 restrictions this is a temporary work from home role but will ultimately work in the Atlanta GA officeResponsibilities Lead a group of software developers to achieve desired delivery outcomes focused on systems and applications roadmap deliverables Develop and deliver platform and application enhancements which meet or exceed customer needs Plan and deliver core technology upgrades for our digital platforms Diagnose design and implement solutions to key technology or application problems Proactively collaborate and partner with internal stakeholders to deliver business impacting projects Bring creative solutions to the table Qualifications BABS degree in related field with 10 years of related experience MS with 8 years experience PhD with 5 years experience or an equivalent combination of education and workrelated experience Strong handson technical track record Ability to communicate ideas alternatives and solutions Strong communication skills selfdirection and solid problemsolving skills with a focus on delivering innovative platform solutions Proven ability to be selfdirected and operate effectively in a fastpaced highenergy environment Have a strong application development background with experience in some or all of the following technologies Java Tomcat Spring JavaScript HTML5 JSON React AWS Typescript Ruby Should be familiar with deploying and managing apps using automated pipelines including Jenkins and AWS Code DeployltbrgtltligtltulgtPreferred Skills Proven ability to define and implement effective software development methodologies Comfortable with multiple priorities in a fastpaced environmentltbrgtltulgtltligtAbility to lead developers Mobile and Tablet programming experience is a plus Android iOSAbout Cox AutomotiveTheres
